book.synopsis:
A recover of The New York Times best-selling Tales series.

This collection of tales is edited by the creators of the Dragonlance mythology. The War of the Lance contains a number of short stories by popular Dragonlance authors as well as two stories by Weis and Hickman.
book.title_long: The War of the Lance: Tales, Volume VI
book.dimensions: Height: 5.95 Inches, Length: 4.19 Inches, Weight: 0.35 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
